name: Coffee Machines

items.alias: Fink Fragrant Morning Enhanced Coffee Block
Open Bioplast Folder with a Folded Note

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Hacker Tool" "87814" x 2 #L "Sealing Cell Kit" "157275" #L "White Wine" "130589" #L "Expendable Hologram Camera" "156054" #L "ID-extractor" "156339" #L "Omni-Tek Multi-Form" "156344" #L "Small Titan Message Container" "157222" #L "Fink Fragrant Morning Enhanced Coffee Block" "157281" or #L "Carioso Menthol Pseudo-Coffee Block" "157277" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ ID-extractor + Expendable Hologram Camera = #L "ID-data" "156340" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Small Titan Message Container = #L "Sealed Bioplast Folder" "157341" Skills: | BE | ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Sealed Bioplast Folder = #L "Open Bioplast Folder with a Folded Note" "157272" Skills: | BE | ------------------------------ White Wine + Open Bioplast Folder with a Folded Note = #L "Folded Note" "157273" Skills: | PS120 | ------------------------------ ID-data + Folded Note = #L "Personal Folded Note" "157274" Skills: | PS300 | ------------------------------ Personal Folded Note + Sealing Cell Kit = #L "Sealed Personal Note" "157278" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Sealed Personal Note + Omni-Tek Multi-Form = #L "New Miyashiro Superior Coffee Machine" "157276" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Now you must decide what kind of coffee your machine will produce: For normal coffee: Fink Fragrant Morning Enhanced Coffee Block + New Miyashiro Superior Coffee Machine = #L "Miyashiro Superior Enhanced Coffee Machine" "157340" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Or mentholed one: Carioso Menthol Pseudo-Coffee Block + New Miyashiro Superior Coffee Machine = #L "Miyashiro Superior Menthol Coffee Machine" "157339" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ This machine is used to produce ... Coffee ...
